name.ch: 勞動經濟理論與實務(一)

goal.ch:
勞動經濟學是一門探討雇主與受雇者行為之學問。勞動需求為商品市場的引申性需求，舉凡商品市場之結構與變化、國際貿易的趨勢、景氣的變動、人口結構與人口規模的變動等各種經濟社會狀況都會影響勞動市場及其運作的結果。加上勞資雙方的問題通常同時牽涉貨幣與非貨幣、經濟與政策等諸多的面向，因此，於就業前充分了解勞動市場的各種問題，擁有分析與預測議題未來發展趨勢之能力，對於商管學院學生就業力之培養相當重要。本課程針對此一需求，進行課程之規劃與設計。
課程由現行勞動市場各種議題出發，理論與實務並重，課程內容包含勞動議題的台灣狀況分析、國際趨勢與差異探討、相關理論之分析與應用。課程追求的目標為提升學生經濟分析與思辨之能力，達到學以致用的目標。
goal.en: Labor demand is the derived demand of product market. Economic and social conditions, such as the structure and changes in the product market, the trend of international trade, and changes in the population size and composition, affect the labor market and its outcome. While issues between employers and employees normally involve both monetary and non-monetary aspects. Understanding contemporary labor market issues before entering the market are important so as to enhance college students’ employability. This course is designed in response to the above mentioned needs. In this course, a balance will be maintained between the theoretical and empirical analysis. Some examples, mostly internationally and related to Taiwan, will be provided and discussed in class. The course thus aims to improve students' ability of economic analysis and critical thinking, and to achieve the goal of applying what they have learned in economics.
